Package swingtree.style

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Layout
    Implementations of this are layout configuration for a component, which are value objects that can be created through various factory methods like Layout.border(), Layout.flow(), Layout.grid(int, int)...
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseStyle
    An immutable, wither-like cloner method based settings class for basic component style properties like background color, foundation color, foreground color and the cursor.
    BorderStyle
    An immutable, wither-like cloner method based settings container for border styles that is part of a Style configuration object.
    ComponentExtension<C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
    Is attached to UI components in the form of a client property.
    ComponentStyleDelegate<C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
    A ComponentStyleDelegate is a delegate for a JComponent and its Style configuration used to apply further specify the style of said JComponent.
    DimensionalityStyle  
    FontStyle
    An immutable, wither-like cloner method based settings class for font styles that is part of the full Style configuration object.
    ForegroundStyle  
    GradientStyle
    Use this class to specify a gradient style for various sub styles, like for example BaseStyle or BorderStyle through the ComponentStyleDelegate.gradient(String, Function) or ComponentStyleDelegate.borderGradient(String, Function) methods.
    ImageStyle  
    Layout.BorderLayoutInstaller  
    Layout.ForBoxLayout  
    Layout.ForFlowLayout  
    Layout.ForMigLayout  
    Layout.GridLayoutInstaller  
    Layout.None  
    Layout.Unspecific  
    LayoutStyle  
    PainterStyle  
    ShadowStyle
    An immutable, wither-like cloner method based settings class for shadow styles that is part of the full Style configuration object.
    Style
    An immutable, wither like method based settings container for JComponent styling.
    StyleSheet
    An abstract class that can be extended to create custom style sheets for your Swing application.
    StyleTrait<C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
    A StyleTrait contains a set of properties that will be used to target specific JComponents matching said properties, so that you can associate custom Styler lambdas to them which are using the ComponentStyleDelegate API to configure the style of the component.
